resources.string: Built the Offline Translator app as an Ad Supported app. This SERVICE is provided by at no cost and is intended for use as is.

For a better experience, while using our Service, I may collect some user analytic data and I may also require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information. That information maybe used to improve user experience The app also uses third party services that may collect information used to identify you.

Name of the third party service providers used by the app
1)Google Play Services\n 2)AdMob\n 3)Meta Audience Network

This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by me. Therefore, I strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. I have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

I may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. I will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.
For privacy policy related inquiries you can contact me at anbdevelopers.apps@gmail.com
